# samsungcloudplatformv2_dns_hosted_zone (Data Source)

Show HostedZone.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_dns_hosted_zone" "hosted_zone" {
  id = var.id
}


output "hosted_zone" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_dns_hosted_zone.hosted_zone
}

variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
